I'm Jon Canady, a web developer living in Columbus Ohio. I work for a fantastic company called Innova Partners, also based in Columbus. I specialize in backend web development with dynamic languages; Innova primarily uses PHP, I personally love Ruby, and I can dabble in Python if the need be. I'm interested in web design, and I'm working my way towards being a competent front-end designer as well.

I have an awesome wife, occasionally remember to upload photos, tweet, release source code, and read comics.
